name: Abubakar Abid
about: Abubakar Abid is a PhD student at Stanford University who develops machine learning methods for messy biomedical problems in genetics, medical imaging, and time-series data. He is also interested in making machine learning models work better in interdisciplinary settings, and cofounded Gradio.

name: Mohamed S. Abdelfattah
about: Mohamed is a Principal Scientist at Samsung AI research. His work centers around efficient AI including AutoML, hardware and neural network compression.
